message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite low considering the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
